com.palomamobile.android.sdk.verification.email

Interface IEmailVerificationService


  • public interface IEmailVerificationService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Verification Service RESTful API. All calls are synchronous. To get a concrete implementation of this interface call IServiceManager.getService() This class provides somewhat low level access to the Server API it may be more convenient to use methods in IEmailVerificationManager.
    See Also:
    Paloma Mobile Platform Verification Service RESTful API

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Void postEmailVerification(String requestId, String emailAddress, String ignored)
      Post an email address to be verified, this will trigger a verification email with a code to be sent to that email address.
      Void updateEmailVerification(String requestId, String emailAddress, VerificationEmailUpdate verificationEmailUpdate)
      Complete verification cycle for a given email address by providing the secret code from the verification email.
      User updateUserEmail(String requestId, long userId, UserVerifiedEmailUpdate userVerifiedEmailUpdate)
      Update user verified email address and return the updated User that matches the provided userId on success.

    • Method Detail

      • postEmailVerification

        Void postEmailVerification(String requestId,
                         String emailAddress,
                         String ignored)
        Post an email address to be verified, this will trigger a verification email with a code to be sent to that email address.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        emailAddress - email address to verify
        Returns:
        void JobCreateEmailVerification provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.

      • updateEmailVerification

        Void updateEmailVerification(String requestId,
                           String emailAddress,
                           VerificationEmailUpdate verificationEmailUpdate)
        Complete verification cycle for a given email address by providing the secret code from the verification email.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        emailAddress - email address to verify
        verificationEmailUpdate - parameters for update of a verification email
        Returns:
        void JobPostEmailVerificationUpdate provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.

      • updateUserEmail

        User updateUserEmail(String requestId,
                   long userId,
                   UserVerifiedEmailUpdate userVerifiedEmailUpdate)
        Update user verified email address and return the updated User that matches the provided userId on success. Throws retrofit.RetrofitError on failure.
        JobPostUserVerifiedEmail provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        userId -
        userVerifiedEmailUpdate -
        Returns:
        existing user
